entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:56 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: S 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
